# Td Box Add
<!--
@name: Td Box Add
@description: Create a 3D box and add it to the Parent object.
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Create a 3D box and add it to the Parent object.

<b>Syntax</b>
```basic
Td Box Add "bloc1", ParentName$ = "scene", Image$ = "marble"
```
## Parameters

- **ObjectName&dollar;**: Name of the new 3D box object
- **ParentName&dollar;**: Name of the parent object to which the new cube will be added.
- _Image&dollar;_ (optional): Name of the image that will be used like a texture
- _Width#_ (optional): Width of the object. 1.0 by default.
- _Height#_ (optional): Height of the object. 1.0 by default.
- _Depth#_ (optional): Depth of the object. 1.0 by default.
- _Color&dollar;_ (optional): HTML Color used for this object. Si non renseignée, "#FFFFFF" est utilisée par défaut.
- _RepX_ (optional): Repetition of the texture in the X axis. 1 by default.
- _RepY_ (optional): Repetition of the texture in the Y axis. 1 by default.
---
<p align="center"><img valign="middle" width="76px" src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/en/image001.png" /></p>
